022import static java.util.Arrays.asList;
023import static java.util.stream.Collectors.toList;
024import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.ABSTRACT;
025import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.FINAL;
026import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
027import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
028import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.STATIC;
029import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
030import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.CLASS_WITH_TOO_MANY_FIELDS;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.OBJECT;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.TypeSpecImpl.Kind.ANNOTATION;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.Util.createDebugOutput;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.checkState;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireValidArgument;
041import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireValidNonNullArgument;
042import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.JavaUtils.isValidName;
043import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;

045import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
046import javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind;
047import javax.lang.model.element.Modifier;
048import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
049import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
050import java.lang.reflect.Type;
051import java.util.ArrayList;
052import java.util.Arrays;
053import java.util.Collection;
054import java.util.EnumSet;
055import java.util.List;
056import java.util.Map;

058import java.util.Set;
059import java.util.TreeSet;

061import org.apiguardian.api.API;
062import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
063import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.MountPoint;
064import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.UnexpectedExceptionError;

080/**
081 *  The abstract base class for the implementations of
082 *  {@link TypeSpec}.
083 *
084 *  @author Square,Inc.
085 *  @modified   Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
086 *  @version $Id: TypeSpecImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $
087 *  @since 0.0.5
088 *
089 *  @UMLGraph.link
090 */
091@SuppressWarnings( {"ClassWithTooManyFields", "ClassWithTooManyMethods", "OverlyComplexClass", "OverlyCoupledClass"} )
092@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: TypeSpecImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $" )
093@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
094public abstract sealed class TypeSpecImpl implements TypeSpec
095    permits AnnotationTypeSpecImpl, ClassSpecImpl, EnumSpecImpl, InterfaceSpecImpl, RecordSpecImpl
096{
097        /*---------------*\
098    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
099        \*---------------*/
100    /**
101     *  The abstract base class for the implementations of
102     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeSpec.Builder}.
103     *
104     *  @author Square,Inc.
105     *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
106     *  @version $Id: TypeSpecImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $
107     *  @since 0.0.5
108     *
109     *  @UMLGraph.link
110     */
111    @SuppressWarnings( "OverlyCoupledClass" )
112    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: TypeSpecImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $" )
113    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
114    public abstract static sealed class BuilderImpl implements TypeSpec.Builder
115        permits AnnotationTypeSpecImpl.BuilderImpl, ClassSpecImpl.BuilderImpl, EnumSpecImpl.BuilderImpl, InterfaceSpecImpl.BuilderImpl, RecordSpecImpl.BuilderImpl
116    {
117            /*------------*\
118        ====** Attributes **===================================================
119            \*------------*/
120        /**
121         *  The annotations for the type spec.
122         */
123        private final Collection<AnnotationSpecImpl> m_Annotations = new ArrayList<>();
124
125        /**
126         *  The reference to the factory.
127         */
128        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
129        private final JavaComposer m_Composer;
130
131        /**
132         *  The attributes for this type spec.
133         */
134        private final Collection<FieldSpecImpl> m_FieldSpecs = new ArrayList<>();
135
136        /**
137         *  The initializer block.
138         */
139        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
140        private final CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl m_InitializerBlock;
141
142        /**
143         *  The Javadoc comment for the type.
144         */
145        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
146        private final CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl m_Javadoc;
147
148        /**
149         *  The kind of the type (enum, interface, regular class, &hellip;).
150         *
151         *  @see TypeSpecImpl.Kind
152         */
153        private final Kind m_Kind;
154
155        /**
156         *  The methods for this type.
157         */
158        private final Collection<MethodSpecImpl> m_MethodSpecs = new ArrayList<>();
159
160        /**
161         *  The modifiers.
162         */
163        private final Set<Modifier> m_Modifiers = EnumSet.noneOf( Modifier.class );
164
165        /**
166         *  The name of the type.
167         */
168        @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
169        private final Optional<String> m_Name;
170
171        /**
172         *  TODO Write the comment for the field m_OriginatingElements!!
173         */
174        private final List<Element> m_OriginatingElements = new ArrayList<>();
175
176        /**
177         *  The builder for the static block of the type.
178         */
179        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
180        private final CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl m_StaticBlock;
181
182        /**
183         *  The static imports.
184         */
185        private final Collection<String> m_StaticImports = new TreeSet<>();
186
187        /**
188         *  The superclass for the type.
189         */
190        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
191        private TypeNameImpl m_Superclass = OBJECT;
192
193        /**
194         *  The superinterfaces for the type.
195         */
196        private final Collection<TypeNameImpl> m_Superinterfaces = new ArrayList<>();
197
198        /**
199         *  The suppressable warnings for the new type.
200         */
201        private final Set<SuppressableWarnings> m_SuppressableWarnings = EnumSet.noneOf( SuppressableWarnings.class );
202
203        /**
204         *  The inner classes (embedded types) for the type.
205         */
206        private final Collection<TypeSpecImpl> m_TypeSpecs = new ArrayList<>();
207
208        /**
209         *  The type variables for the type.
210         */
211        private final Collection<TypeVariableNameImpl> m_TypeVariables = new ArrayList<>();
212
213            /*--------------*\
214        ====** Constructors **=================================================
215            \*--------------*/
216        /**
217         *  Creates a new {@code BuilderImpl} instance.
218         *
219         *  @param  composer    The reference to the factory that created this
220         *      builder instance.
221         *  @param  kind    The kind of the type to build.
222         *  @param  name    The name of the type to build.
223         */
224        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
225        protected BuilderImpl( final JavaComposer composer, final Kind kind, final CharSequence name )
226        {
227            this( composer, kind, Optional.of( requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" ).toString() ) );
228        }   //  BuilderImpl()
229
230        /**
231         *  Creates a new {@code BuilderImpl} instance for an anonymous type.
232         *
233         *  @param  composer    The reference to the factory that created this
234         *      builder instance.
235         *  @param  kind    The kind of the type to build.
236         */
237        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
238        protected BuilderImpl( final JavaComposer composer, final Kind kind )
239        {
240            this( composer, kind, Optional.empty() );
241        }   //  BuilderImpl()
242
243        /**
244         *  Creates a new {@code BuilderImpl} instance.
245         *
246         *  @param  composer    The reference to the factory that created this
247         *      builder instance.
248         *  @param  kind    The kind of the type to build.
249         *  @param  name    The name of the type to build.
250         */
251        @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "CastToConcreteClass", "OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent"} )
252        protected BuilderImpl( final JavaComposer composer, final Kind kind, final Optional<String> name )
253        {
254            m_Composer = requireNonNullArgument( composer, "composer" );
255            m_Kind = requireNonNullArgument( kind, "kind" );
256            m_Name = requireValidNonNullArgument( name, "name", v -> v.isEmpty() || isValidName( v.get() ), $ -> format( "not a valid name: %s", name.get() ) );
257
258            m_InitializerBlock = (CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl) m_Composer.codeBlockBuilder();
259            m_Javadoc = (CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl) m_Composer.codeBlockBuilder();
260            m_StaticBlock = (CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl) m_Composer.codeBlockBuilder();
261        }   //  BuilderImpl()
262
263            /*---------*\
264        ====** Methods **======================================================
265            \*---------*/
266        /**
267         *  {@inheritDoc}
268         */
269        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
270        @Override
271        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final AnnotationSpec annotationSpec )
272        {
273            final var annotationSpecImpl = (AnnotationSpecImpl) requireNonNullArgument( annotationSpec, "annotationSpec" );
274            m_Annotations.add( annotationSpecImpl );
275
276            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
277            return this;
278        }   //  addAnnotation()
279
280        /**
281         *  {@inheritDoc}
282         */
283        @Override
284        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final Class<?> annotation )
285        {
286            return addAnnotation( ClassNameImpl.from( annotation ) );
287        }   //  addAnnotation()
288
289        /**
290         *  {@inheritDoc}
291         */
292        @Override
293        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final ClassName annotation )
294        {
295            return addAnnotation( m_Composer.annotationBuilder( annotation ).build() );
296        }   //  addAnnotation()
297
298        /**
299         *  {@inheritDoc}
300         */
301        @Override
302        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
303        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotations( final Iterable<AnnotationSpec> annotationSpecs )
304        {
305            for( final var annotationSpec : requireNonNullArgument( annotationSpecs, "annotationSpecs" ) )
306            {
307                m_Annotations.add( (AnnotationSpecImpl) annotationSpec );
308            }
309
310            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
311            return this;
312        }   //  addAnnotations()
313
314        /**
315         *  {@inheritDoc}
316         */
317        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
318        @Override
319        public abstract BuilderImpl addAttribute( final FieldSpec fieldSpec, final boolean readOnly );
320
321        /**
322         *  {@inheritDoc}
323         */
324        @Override
325        public final BuilderImpl addEnumConstant( final CharSequence name )
326        {
327            return addEnumConstant( name, anonymousClassBuilder( EMPTY_STRING ).build() );
328        }   //  addEnumConstant()
329
330        /**
331         *  {@inheritDoc}
332         */
333        @Override
334        public final BuilderImpl addEnumConstant( final CharSequence name, final CodeBlock javaDoc )
335        {
336            final var anonymousClass = anonymousClassBuilder( EMPTY_STRING )
337                .addJavadoc( requireNonNullArgument( javaDoc, "javaDoc" ) )
338                .build();
339            addEnumConstant( name, anonymousClass );
340
341            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
342            return this;
343        }   //  addEnumConstant()
344
345        /**
346         *  {@inheritDoc}
347         */
348        @Override
349        public final BuilderImpl addEnumConstant( final CharSequence name, final String format, final Object... args )
350        {
351            final var anonymousClass = anonymousClassBuilder( EMPTY_STRING )
352                .addJavadoc( format, args )
353                .build();
354            addEnumConstant( name, anonymousClass );
355
356            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
357            return this;
358        }   //  addEnumConstant()
359
360        /**
361         *  {@inheritDoc}
362         */
363        @Override
364        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
365        public BuilderImpl addEnumConstant( final CharSequence name, final TypeSpec typeSpec )
366        {
367            throw new IllegalStateException( format( "%s is not enum", m_Name.orElse( NAME_ANONYMOUS_TYPE ) ) );
368        }   //  addEnumConstant()
369
370        /**
371         *  {@inheritDoc}
372         */
373        @Override
374        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
375        public BuilderImpl addField( final FieldSpec fieldSpec )
376        {
377            final var fieldSpecImpl = (FieldSpecImpl) requireNonNullArgument( fieldSpec, "fieldSpec" );
378            if( composer().addDebugOutput() )
379            {
380                final var builder = fieldSpecImpl.toBuilder();
381                createDebugOutput( true ).ifPresent( debug -> builder.addJavadoc( "\n$L\n", debug.asLiteral() ) );
382                m_FieldSpecs.add( builder.build() );
383            }
384            else
385            {
386                m_FieldSpecs.add( fieldSpecImpl );
387            }
388
389            final var maxFields = composer().getMaxFields();
390            if( (maxFields > 0) && (m_FieldSpecs.size() >= maxFields) )
391            {
392                addSuppressableWarning( CLASS_WITH_TOO_MANY_FIELDS );
393            }
394
395            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
396            return this;
397        }   //  addField()
398
399        /**
400         *  {@inheritDoc}
401         */
402        @Override
403        public final BuilderImpl addField( final Type type, final CharSequence name, final Modifier... modifiers )
404        {
405            return addField( TypeNameImpl.from( type ), name, modifiers );
406        }   //  addField()
407
408        /**
409         *  {@inheritDoc}
410         */
411        @Override
412        public final BuilderImpl addField( final TypeName type, final CharSequence name, final Modifier... modifiers )
413        {
414            return addField( m_Composer.fieldBuilder( type, name, modifiers ).build() );
415        }   //  addField()
416
417        /**
418         *  {@inheritDoc}
419         */
420        @Override
421        public final BuilderImpl addFields( final Iterable<? extends FieldSpec> fieldSpecs )
422        {
423            for( final var fieldSpec : requireNonNullArgument( fieldSpecs, "fieldSpecs" ) )
424            {
425                addField( fieldSpec );
426            }
427
428            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
429            return this;
430        }   //  addFields()
431
432        /**
433         *  {@inheritDoc}
434         */
435        @Override
436        public BuilderImpl addInitializerBlock( final CodeBlock block )
437        {
438            m_InitializerBlock.beginControlFlow( EMPTY_STRING )
439                .add( requireNonNullArgument( block, "block" ) )
440                .endControlFlow();
441
442            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
443            return this;
444        }   //  addInitializerBlock()
445
446        /**
447         *  {@inheritDoc}
448         */
449        @Override
450        public final BuilderImpl addJavadoc( final CodeBlock block )
451        {
452            createDebugOutput( m_Composer.addDebugOutput() )
453                .ifPresent( debug -> m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( debug.asLiteral() ) );
454            m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( block );
455
456            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
457            return this;
458        }   //  addJavadoc()
459
460        /**
461         *  {@inheritDoc}
462         */
463        @Override
464        public final BuilderImpl addJavadoc( final String format, final Object... args )
465        {
466            createDebugOutput( m_Composer.addDebugOutput() )
467                .ifPresent( debug -> m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( debug.asLiteral() ) );
468            m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( format, args );
469
470            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
471            return this;
472        }   //  addJavadoc()
473
474        /**
475         *  {@inheritDoc}
476         */
477        @Override
478        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
479        public abstract BuilderImpl addMethod( final MethodSpec methodSpec );
480
481        /**
482         *  {@inheritDoc}
483         */
484        @Override
485        @SuppressWarnings( "BoundedWildcard" )
486        public final BuilderImpl addMethods( final Iterable<MethodSpec> methodSpecs )
487        {
488            for( final var methodSpec : requireNonNullArgument( methodSpecs, "methodSpecs" ) )
489            {
490                addMethod( methodSpec );
491            }
492
493            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
494            return this;
495        }   //  addMethods()
496
497        /**
498         *  {@inheritDoc}
499         */
500        @Override
501        public final BuilderImpl addModifiers( final Modifier... modifiers )
502        {
503            checkState( !isAnonymousClass(), () -> new IllegalStateException( "forbidden on anonymous types." ) );
504            for( final var modifier : requireNonNullArgument( modifiers, "modifiers" ) )
505            {
506                checkState( nonNull( modifier ), () -> new ValidationException( "modifiers contain null" ) );
507                m_Modifiers.add( modifier );
508            }
509
510            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
511            return this;
512        }   //  addModifiers()
513
514        /**
515         *  {@inheritDoc}
516         */
517        @Override
518        public final BuilderImpl addOriginatingElement( final Element originatingElement )
519        {
520            m_OriginatingElements.add( originatingElement );
521
522            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
523            return this;
524        }   //  addOriginatingElement()
525
526        /**
527         *  {@inheritDoc}
528         */
529        @SuppressWarnings( "AbstractMethodOverridesAbstractMethod" )
530        @Override
531        public abstract Builder addProperty( final FieldSpec fieldSpec, final boolean readOnly );
532
533        /**
534         *  {@inheritDoc}
535         */
536        @Override
537        public BuilderImpl addStaticBlock( final CodeBlock block )
538        {
539            m_StaticBlock.beginControlFlow( "static" )
540                .add( block )
541                .endControlFlow();
542
543            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
544            return this;
545        }   //  addStaticBlock()
546
547        /**
548         *  {@inheritDoc}
549         */
550        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
551        @Override
552        public final BuilderImpl addStaticImport( final Class<?> clazz, final String... names )
553        {
554            return addStaticImport( ClassNameImpl.from( clazz ), names );
555        }   //  addStaticImport()
556
557        /**
558         *  {@inheritDoc}
559         */
560        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
561        @Override
562        public final BuilderImpl addStaticImport( final ClassName className, final String... names )
563        {
564            final var canonicalName = requireNonNullArgument( className, "className" ).canonicalName();
565            for( final var name : requireValidNonNullArgument( names, "names", v -> v.length > 0, n -> format( "%s array is empty", n ) ) )
566            {
567                m_StaticImports.add(
568                    format(
569                        "%s.%s",
570                        canonicalName,
571                        requireValidArgument(
572                            name,
573                            "name",
574                            Objects::nonNull,
575                            $ -> format( "null entry in names array: %s", Arrays.toString( names ) )
576                        )
577                    )
578                );
579            }
580
581            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
582            return this;
583        }   //  addStaticImport()
584
585        /**
586         *  {@inheritDoc}
587         */
588        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
589        @Override
590        public final BuilderImpl addStaticImport( final Enum<?> constant )
591        {
592            return addStaticImport( ClassNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( constant, "constant" ).getDeclaringClass() ), constant.name() );
593        }   //  addStaticImport()
594
595        /**
596         *  {@inheritDoc}
597         */
598        @Override
599        public final BuilderImpl addSuperinterface( final Class<?> superinterface )
600        {
601            addSuperinterface( TypeName.from( requireValidNonNullArgument( superinterface, "superinterface", Class::isInterface, $ -> format( "'%s' is not an interface", superinterface.getName() ) ) ) );
602
603            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
604            return this;
605        }   //  addSuperinterface()
606
607        /**
608         *  {@inheritDoc}
609         */
610        @Override
611        public final BuilderImpl addSuperinterface( final Type superinterface )
612        {
613            return addSuperinterface( TypeName.from( superinterface ) );
614        }   //  addSuperinterface()
615
616        /**
617         *  {@inheritDoc}
618         */
619        @Override
620        public final BuilderImpl addSuperinterface( final TypeElement superinterface )
621        {
622            addSuperinterface( TypeName.from( requireValidNonNullArgument( superinterface, "superinterface", v -> v.getKind() == ElementKind.INTERFACE, $ -> format( "'%s' is not an interface", superinterface.getQualifiedName() ) ).asType() ) );
623
624            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
625            return this;
626        }   //  addSuperinterface()
627
628        /**
629         *  {@inheritDoc}
630         */
631        @Override
632        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
633        public final BuilderImpl addSuperinterface( final TypeName superinterface )
634        {
635            checkState( m_Kind != ANNOTATION, () -> new IllegalStateException( format( "Annotations do not implement interfaces: %s", getName() ) ) );
636            m_Superinterfaces.add( (TypeNameImpl) requireNonNullArgument( superinterface, "superinterface" ) );
637
638            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
639            return this;
640        }   //  addSuperinterface()
641
642        /**
643         *  {@inheritDoc}
644         */
645        @Override
646        public final BuilderImpl addSuperinterfaces( final Iterable<? extends TypeName> superinterfaces )
647        {
648            for( final TypeName superinterface : requireNonNullArgument( superinterfaces, "superinterfaces" ) )
649            {
650                addSuperinterface( superinterface );
651            }
652
653            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
654            return this;
655        }   //  addSuperinterfaces()
656
657        /**
658         *  {@inheritDoc}
659         */
660        @Override
661        public Builder addSuppressableWarning( final SuppressableWarnings... warnings )
662        {
663            if( nonNull( warnings ) )
664            {
665                m_SuppressableWarnings.addAll( asList( warnings ) );
666            }
667
668            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
669            return this;
670        }   //  addSuppressableWarning()
671
672        /**
673         *  {@inheritDoc}
674         */
675        @Override
676        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
677        public final BuilderImpl addType( final TypeSpec typeSpec )
678        {
679            final var typeSpecImpl = (TypeSpecImpl) requireNonNullArgument( typeSpec, "typeSpec" );
680            checkState( typeSpecImpl.modifiers().containsAll( m_Kind.implicitTypeModifiers() ), () -> new ValidationException( format( "%s %s.%s requires modifiers %s", m_Kind, m_Name.orElse( NAME_ANONYMOUS_TYPE ), typeSpecImpl.name().orElse( NAME_ANONYMOUS_TYPE ), m_Kind.implicitTypeModifiers() ) ) );
681            if( composer().addDebugOutput() )
682            {
683                final var builder = typeSpecImpl.toBuilder();
684                createDebugOutput( true ).ifPresent( debug -> builder.addJavadoc( "\n$L\n", debug.asLiteral() ) );
685                m_TypeSpecs.add( builder.build() );
686            }
687            else
688            {
689                m_TypeSpecs.add( typeSpecImpl );
690            }
691
692            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
693            return this;
694        }   //  addType()
695
696        /**
697         *  {@inheritDoc}
698         */
699        @Override
700        public final BuilderImpl addTypes( final Iterable<? extends TypeSpec> typeSpecs )
701        {
702            for( final var typeSpec : requireNonNullArgument( typeSpecs, "typeSpecs" ) )
703            {
704                addType( typeSpec );
705            }
706
707            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
708            return this;
709        }   //  addTypes()
710
711        /**
712         *  {@inheritDoc}
713         */
714        @Override
715        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
716        public final BuilderImpl addTypeVariable( final TypeVariableName typeVariable )
717        {
718            checkState( !isAnonymousClass(), () -> new IllegalStateException( "forbidden on anonymous types." ) );
719            m_TypeVariables.add( (TypeVariableNameImpl) requireNonNullArgument( typeVariable, "typeVariable" ) );
720
721            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
722            return this;
723        }   //  addTypeVariable()
724
725        /**
726         *  {@inheritDoc}
727         */
728        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
729        @Override
730        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
731        public final BuilderImpl addTypeVariable( final TypeVariableName typeVariable, final CharSequence javadoc )
732        {
733            final var retValue = addTypeVariable( typeVariable );
734            createDebugOutput( m_Composer.addDebugOutput() )
735                .ifPresent( v -> m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( v.asLiteral() ) );
736            m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo(
737                """
738                \n@param <$L> $S
739                """, typeVariable, requireNotEmptyArgument( javadoc, "javadoc" ) );
740
741            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
742            return retValue;
743        }   //  addTypeVariable()
744
745        /**
746         *  {@inheritDoc}
747         */
748        @Override
749        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
750        public final BuilderImpl addTypeVariables( final Iterable<TypeVariableName> typeVariables )
751        {
752            requireNonNullArgument( typeVariables, "typeVariables" );
753            checkState( !isAnonymousClass(), () -> new IllegalStateException( "forbidden on anonymous types." ) );
754            for( final var typeVariable : typeVariables )
755            {
756                m_TypeVariables.add( (TypeVariableNameImpl) typeVariable );
757            }
758
759            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
760            return this;
761        }   //  addTypeVariables()
762
763        /**
764         *  {@inheritDoc}
765         */
766        @Override
767        public abstract TypeSpecImpl build();
768

774        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )

913        /**
914         *  Returns a flag whether this class is an anonymous class or not.
915         *
916         *  @return {@code true} if the class is an anonymous class,
917         *      {@code false} if it is named.
918         */
919        @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "BooleanMethodIsAlwaysInverted"} )
920        @MountPoint
921        public boolean isAnonymousClass() { return false; }
922
923        /**
924         *  {@inheritDoc}
925         */
926        @Override
927        public final BuilderImpl superclass( final Type superclass )
928        {
929            return superclass( TypeName.from( superclass ) );
930        }   //  superclass()
931
932        /**
933         *  {@inheritDoc}
934         */
935        @Override
936        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
937        public BuilderImpl superclass( final TypeName superclass )
938        {
939            checkState( m_Superclass == OBJECT, () -> new IllegalStateException( format( "superclass already set to %s", m_Superclass.toString() ) ));
940            m_Superclass = (TypeNameImpl) requireValidNonNullArgument( superclass, "superclass", v -> !v.isPrimitive(), $ -> "superclass may not be a primitive" );
941
942            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
943            return this;
944        }   //  superclass()
945    }
946    //  class BuilderImpl

948    /**
949     *  The kind of type specified by a
950     *  {@link TypeSpecImpl}
951     *  instance.
952     *
953     *  @author Square,Inc.
954     *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
955     *  @version $Id: TypeSpecImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $
956     *  @since 0.0.5
957     *
958     *  @UMLGraph.link
959     */
960    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: TypeSpecImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $" )
961    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
962    public enum Kind
963    {
964            /*------------------*\
965        ====** Enum Declaration **=============================================
966            \*------------------*/
967        /**
968         *  The type is an annotation.
969         */
970        ANNOTATION( EnumSet.of( PUBLIC, STATIC, FINAL ), EnumSet.of( PUBLIC, ABSTRACT ), EnumSet.of( PUBLIC, STATIC ), EnumSet.of( STATIC ) ),
971
972        /**
973         *  The type is a regular class.
974         */
975        CLASS( EnumSet.noneOf( Modifier.class ), EnumSet.noneOf( Modifier.class ), EnumSet.noneOf( Modifier.class ), EnumSet.noneOf( Modifier.class ) ),
976
977        /**
978         *  The type is an {@code enum}.
979         */
980        ENUM( EnumSet.noneOf( Modifier.class ), EnumSet.noneOf( Modifier.class ), EnumSet.noneOf( Modifier.class ), EnumSet.of( STATIC ) ),
981
982        /**
983         *  The type is an interface.
984         */
985        INTERFACE( EnumSet.of( PUBLIC, STATIC, FINAL ), EnumSet.of( PUBLIC, ABSTRACT ), EnumSet.of( PUBLIC, STATIC ), EnumSet.of( STATIC ) ),
986
987        /**
988         *  The type is an interface.
989         */
990        RECORD( EnumSet.of( PRIVATE ), EnumSet.noneOf( Modifier.class ), EnumSet.of( FINAL ), EnumSet.of( STATIC ) );
991
992            /*------------*\
993        ====** Attributes **===================================================
994            \*------------*/
995        /**
996         *  TODO Write the comment for the field m_AsMemberModifiers!!
997         */
998        private final Set<Modifier> m_AsMemberModifiers;
999
1000        /**
1001         *  The implicit field modifiers for a type of this kind.
1002         */
1003        private final Set<Modifier> m_ImplicitFieldModifiers;
1004
1005        /**
1006         *  The implicit method modifiers for a type of this kind.
1007         */
1008        private final Set<Modifier> m_ImplicitMethodModifiers;
1009
1010        /**
1011         *  The implicit type modifiers for a type of this kind.
1012         */
1013        private final Set<Modifier> m_ImplicitTypeModifiers;
1014
1015            /*--------------*\
1016        ====** Constructors **=================================================
1017            \*--------------*/
1018        /**
1019         *  Creates a new {@code Kind} instance.
1020         *
1021         *  @param  implicitFieldModifiers  The implicit field modifiers for a
1022         *      type of this kind.
1023         *  @param  implicitMethodModifiers The implicit method modifiers for a
1024         *      type of this kind.
1025         *  @param  implicitTypeModifiers   The implicit type modifiers for a
1026         *      type of this kind.
1027         *  @param  asMemberModifiers   The member modifiers for a type of this
1028         *      kind.
1029         */
1030        private Kind( final Collection<Modifier> implicitFieldModifiers, final Collection<Modifier> implicitMethodModifiers, final Collection<Modifier> implicitTypeModifiers, final Collection<Modifier> asMemberModifiers )
1031        {
1032            m_ImplicitFieldModifiers = Set.copyOf( implicitFieldModifiers );
1033            m_ImplicitMethodModifiers = Set.copyOf( implicitMethodModifiers );
1034            m_ImplicitTypeModifiers = Set.copyOf( implicitTypeModifiers );
1035            m_AsMemberModifiers = Set.copyOf( asMemberModifiers );
1036        }   //  Kind()
1037
1038            /*---------*\
1039        ====** Methods **======================================================
1040            \*---------*/
1041        /**
1042         *  TODO Write the comment for method Kind.asMemberModifiers()!!
1043         *
1044         *  @return ?
1045         */
1046        public final Set<Modifier> asMemberModifiers()
1047        {
1048            return m_AsMemberModifiers;
1049        }   //  asMemberModifiers()
1050
1051        /**
1052         *  Returns the implicit field modifiers for this kind.
1053         *
1054         *  @return The implicit filed modifiers for this kind.
1055         */
1056        public final Set<Modifier> implicitFieldModifiers()
1057        {
1058            return m_ImplicitFieldModifiers;
1059        }   //  implicitFieldModifiers()
1060
1061        /**
1062         *  Returns the implicit method modifiers for this kind.
1063         *
1064         *  @return The implicit method modifiers for this kind.
1065         */
1066        public final Set<Modifier> implicitMethodModifiers()
1067        {
1068            return m_ImplicitMethodModifiers;
1069        }   //  implicitMethodModifiers()
1070
1071        /**
1072         *  Returns the implicit type modifiers for this kind.
1073         *
1074         *  @return The implicit type modifiers for this kind.
1075         */
1076        public final Set<Modifier> implicitTypeModifiers()
1077        {
1078            return m_ImplicitTypeModifiers;
1079        }   //  implicitTypeModifiers()
1080    }

1102     *  {@link #toString()}

1105    private final Lazy<String> m_CachedString;

1193        /*--------------*\
1194    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
1195        \*--------------*/
1196    /**
1197     *  Creates a new {@code TypeSpecImpl} instance.
1198     *
1199     *  @param  builder The builder for this instance.
1200     */
1201    @SuppressWarnings( "AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject" )
1202    protected TypeSpecImpl( final BuilderImpl builder )
1203    {
1204        m_Composer = builder.m_Composer;
1205        m_Kind = builder.m_Kind;
1206        m_Name = builder.m_Name;
1207        m_Javadoc = builder.m_Javadoc.build();
1208        m_Annotations = List.copyOf( builder.m_Annotations );
1209        m_Modifiers = Set.copyOf( builder.m_Modifiers );
1210        m_TypeVariables = List.copyOf( builder.m_TypeVariables );
1211        m_SuperClass = builder.m_Superclass;
1212        m_SuperInterfaces = List.copyOf( builder.m_Superinterfaces );
1213        m_FieldSpecs = List.copyOf( builder.m_FieldSpecs );
1214        m_StaticBlock = builder.m_StaticBlock.build();
1215        m_InitializerBlock = builder.m_InitializerBlock.build();
1216        m_MethodSpecs = List.copyOf( builder.m_MethodSpecs );
1217        m_TypeSpecs = List.copyOf( builder.m_TypeSpecs );
1218
1219        final Set<String> staticImports = new TreeSet<>( builder.m_StaticImports );
1220        staticImports.addAll( m_Javadoc.getStaticImports() );
1221        m_FieldSpecs.forEach( fspec -> staticImports.addAll( fspec.getStaticImports() ) );
1222        staticImports.addAll( m_StaticBlock.getStaticImports() );
1223        staticImports.addAll( m_InitializerBlock.getStaticImports() );
1224        m_MethodSpecs.forEach( mspec -> staticImports.addAll( mspec.getStaticImports() ) );
1225        m_TypeSpecs.forEach( tspec -> staticImports.addAll( tspec.getStaticImports() ) );
1226        m_StaticImports = Set.copyOf( staticImports );
1227
1228        final Collection<Element> originatingElementsMutable = new ArrayList<>( builder.m_OriginatingElements );
1229        for( final var typeSpec : builder.m_TypeSpecs )
1230        {
1231            originatingElementsMutable.addAll( typeSpec.m_OriginatingElements );
1232        }
1233        m_OriginatingElements = List.copyOf( originatingElementsMutable );
1234
1235        m_SuppressableWarnings.addAll( builder.m_SuppressableWarnings );
1236
1237        m_CachedString = Lazy.use( this::initializeCachedString );
1238    }   //  TypeSpecImpl()
1239
1240    /**
1241     *  Creates a dummy type spec for type-resolution in CodeWriter only while
1242     *  emitting the type declaration but before entering the type body.
1243     *
1244     *  @param  type    The source type.
1245     */
1246    @SuppressWarnings( "AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject" )
1247    protected TypeSpecImpl( final TypeSpecImpl type )
1248    {
1249        m_Composer = type.m_Composer;
1250        m_Kind = type.m_Kind;
1251        m_Name = type.m_Name;
1252        m_Javadoc = type.m_Javadoc;
1253        m_Annotations = List.of();
1254        m_Modifiers = Set.of();
1255        m_TypeVariables = List.of();
1256        m_SuperClass = null;
1257        m_SuperInterfaces = List.of();
1258        m_FieldSpecs = List.of();
1259        m_StaticBlock = type.m_StaticBlock;
1260        m_InitializerBlock = type.m_InitializerBlock;
1261        m_MethodSpecs = List.of();
1262        m_TypeSpecs = List.of();
1263        m_OriginatingElements = List.of();
1264        m_StaticImports = type.m_StaticImports;
1265
1266        m_CachedString = Lazy.use( this::initializeCachedString );
1267    }   //  TypeSpecImpl()

1364    /**

1397    {

1399
1400        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1401        return retValue;
1402    }   //  classBuilder()
1403
1404    /**
1405     *  Compares two instances of
1406     *  {@link MethodSpec}
1407     *  for their sort order.
1408     *
1409     *  @param  m1  The first method spec.
1410     *  @param  m2  The second method spec.
1411     *  @return -1 if the first method spec will be sorted before the second,
1412     *      1 if the first method spec will be sorted after the second, and
1413     *      0 if both are equals.
1414     */
1415    protected static final int compareMethodSpecs( final MethodSpec m1, final MethodSpec m2 )
1416    {
1417        var retValue = Integer.signum( m1.name().compareToIgnoreCase( m2.name() ) );
1418        if( retValue == 0 )
1419        {
1420            /*
1421             * MethodSpec.toString() returns the whole method, including the
1422             * modifiers and the return value. But for the sorting, we only
1423             * want to have the signature – that is the name plus the arguments
1424             * list.
1425             * We know already that the name is equal, and we know also that
1426             * the arguments list must be different (okay, we do NOT know that
1427             * for sure, but it does not make sense if not). So we can strip
1428             * everything before the name and compare the remainder.
1429             */
1430            final var name = m1.name();
1431            var s1 = m1.toString();
1432            var pos = s1.indexOf( name );
1433            s1 = s1.substring( pos );
1434
1435            var s2 = m2.toString();
1436            pos = s2.indexOf( name );
1437            s2 = s2.substring( pos );
1438
1439            retValue = Integer.signum( s1.compareToIgnoreCase( s2 ) );
1440        }
1441
1442        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1443        return retValue;
1444    }   //  compareMethodSpecs()
1445
1446    /**
1447     *  Creates a dummy copy of the type spec that is used by
1448     *  {@link #emit(CodeWriter, String, Set)}
1449     *  internally.
1450     *
1451     *  @return The dummy copy.
1452     */
1453    protected abstract TypeSpecImpl createCopy();
1454
1455    /**
1456     *  Emit the type to the given code writer.
1457     *
1458     *  @param  codeWriter  The target code writer.
1459     *  @param  enumName    The name of the enum; will be {@code null} if not
1460     *      called to emit an enum constant.
1461     *  @param  implicitModifiers   The implicit modifiers.
1462     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
1463     *      output target.
1464     */
1465    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
1466    public final void emit( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final String enumName, final Set<Modifier> implicitModifiers ) throws UncheckedIOException
1467    {
1468        /*
1469         * Nested classes interrupt wrapped line indentation. Stash the current
1470         * wrapping state and put it back afterwards when this type is
1471         * complete.
1472         */
1473        final var previousStatementLine = codeWriter.statementLine();
1474        codeWriter.statementLine( -1 );
1475
1476        final var layout = codeWriter.layout();
1477
1478        try
1479        {
1480            switch( layout )
1481            {
1482                case LAYOUT_FOUNDATION -> emit4Foundation( codeWriter, enumName, implicitModifiers );
1483                case LAYOUT_DEFAULT, LAYOUT_JAVAPOET, LAYOUT_JAVAPOET_WITH_TAB -> emit4JavaPoet( codeWriter, enumName, implicitModifiers );
1484                default -> throw new UnsupportedEnumError( codeWriter.layout() );
1485            }
1486        }
1487        finally
1488        {
1489            //---* Reset the statement line *----------------------------------
1490            codeWriter.statementLine( previousStatementLine );
1491        }
1492    }   //  emit()
1493
1494    /**
1495     *  Emits the type to the given code writer, using the layout as defined
1496     *  by the Foundation library code.
1497     *
1498     *  @param  codeWriter  The target code writer.
1499     *  @param  enumName    The name of the enum; can be {@code null}.
1500     *  @param  implicitModifiers   The implicit modifiers.
1501     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
1502     *      output target.
1503     */
1504    @SuppressWarnings( {"BoundedWildcard", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
1505    protected abstract void emit4Foundation( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final String enumName, final Set<Modifier> implicitModifiers ) throws UncheckedIOException;
1506
1507    /**
1508     *  Emits the type to the given code writer, using the layout as defined
1509     *  by the original JavaPoet code.
1510     *
1511     *  @param  codeWriter  The target code writer.
1512     *  @param  enumName    The name of the enum; can be {@code null}.
1513     *  @param  implicitModifiers   The implicit modifiers.
1514     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
1515     *      output target.
1516     */
1517    @SuppressWarnings( {"BoundedWildcard", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
1518    protected abstract void emit4JavaPoet( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final String enumName, final Set<Modifier> implicitModifiers ) throws UncheckedIOException;
1519

1689    /**
1690     *  The initializer for
1691     *  {@link #m_CachedString}.
1692     *
1693     *  @return The return value for
1694     *      {@link #toString()}.
1695     */
1696    private final String initializeCachedString()
1697    {
1698        final var resultBuilder = new StringBuilder();
1699        final var codeWriter = new CodeWriter( m_Composer, resultBuilder );
1700        try
1701        {
1702            emit( codeWriter, null, Set.of() );
1703        }
1704        catch( final UncheckedIOException e )
1705        {
1706            throw new UnexpectedExceptionError( e.getCause() );
1707        }
1708        final var retValue = resultBuilder.toString();
1709
1710        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1711        return retValue;
1712    }   //  initializeCachedString()
1713
1714    /**
1715     *  {@inheritDoc}
1716     */
1717    @Override
1718    public final List<TypeSpec> innerClasses() { return m_TypeSpecs.stream().map( t -> (TypeSpec) t ).collect( toList() ); }
